website_summaries.verdict: A great way to get that classic candlelight feel with a more modern light bulb setup. Can accept a wide variety of standard 100W bulbs.
pros: The surrounding metal globe protects the interior light bulbs from damage or breaking during installation
Design creates plenty of illumination around the room

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Assembly was easy
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Assembly was easy.. well, at least it looked simple, because I was not the one who had to put it together! haha! I probably should have chosen the next bigger version, but then again, it may have looked too overwhelming then ... I think it is a good fit to our breakfast nook. As far as craftsmanship goes, it looks well made from what I can tell.. love the glass part, it just pulls it all together nicely and gives it a unique look.
customer_reviews.author: lunamond

customer_reviews.title: We used 4000k true white light bulbs and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this chandelier in the breakfast nook of the house we're building. It's exactly as expected. I was worried about the yellow hue of the light in the picture. We used 4000k true white light bulbs and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Trendy gorgeous light....you just can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this light a ten if I could. It's beyond beautiful, the picture does not do it justice. My husband had it installed on our 15+ foot vaulted ceiling in less than a half an hour. I used clear 75watt bulbs and they are very brite. I may switch to frosted when they need to be changed, but that doesn't have anything to do with the light itself. The Mercury glass is gorgeous. The over all size is perfect in my 12x15 living room.
customer_reviews.author: Justusmom

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, works great with dimmers
customer_reviews.text: Looks excellent in the formal dining area, great design and we have received many compliments. It's a little tricky to put together as it comes in many pieces, but a great focal point in the space, looks great with dimmer switch
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: but it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The lights had to be straightened and it was smaller than expected, but it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jue

customer_reviews.title: Great chioce
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was so much easier to install than a ceiling fan. It is made of good craftsmanship, easy to assemble, looks amazing in my breakfast nook. Glad I made this great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Lamp that is a majestic accent to our room.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Great entry fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love it, just what I was looking for! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Did not take long to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Did not take long to install. Shipping was super fast and we received it a lot sooner than we expected it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: gustavo martinez

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice, easy to install & good size. Good, basic entry light.
customer_reviews.text: Quite nice, easy to install & good size. Good, basic entry light.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fixture, as does everyone who comes into my home.
customer_reviews.author: D Burch

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary Lighting Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Very contemporary dining light. Great flexibility- the four lights can be pointed up of down. Desire a more romantic dinner without bright, bright light? I had the electrician install a dimmer switch to control the wattage on the lights. I like the fact that it has the correct size light bulbs in it. Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brierley-Peterman

product_meta.title: Sea Gull Lighting 3110404-715 Sfera Four-Light Chandelier Hanging Modern Fixture Autumn Bronze Finish
product_meta.description: No other company can match Sea Gull Lighting's record for producing decorative and functional lighting and ceiling Fan products that influence the marketplace. Their brands are asked for by name, known for their quality and trusted by professional electricians, homebuilders, architects, specifiers and consumers to be the best. Their corporate goals are simple: they aim to be the brands of choice for the end user of our products; the supplier of choice for their distributor and utility customers; and the employer of choice for their employees.
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS OF 4-light chandelier: canopy (diameter x height) 5.5 x 1.25 inches; chain 144 inches; frame (diameter x height) 18.5 x 24.5 inches; highest possible height setting 164.25 inches
TRANSITIONAL STYLE CIRCULAR CHANDELIER LIGHTING: having a round frame with dark bronze finish, the Seagull 4 light chandelier is traditional meets modern, lending a sleek, timeless touch to a room
CIRCULAR CHANDELIER WITH BEAUTIFUL MERCURY GLASS SHADES: the mercury glass shades of the Seagull large circular chandelier look beautifully artistic without obstructing illumination
EASILY CONVERTS TO A LED CIRCULAR CHANDELIER: you can easily convert this 4 light chandelier lighting to LED by buying LED replacement lamps (sold separately)
SEVERAL BULB OPTIONS AVAILABLE: we know everyone has his favorite bulb, which is why the circular metal chandelier has a choice of incandescent, Energy-Star quality fluorescent bulbs
ETL LISTED FOR USE IN DAMP LOCATIONS: your circular chandeliers can still be illuminating the house even in wet weather or in high-moisture spots as it’s ETL listed for use in damp conditions
MODERN CIRCULAR CHANDELIER SPECIFICATIONS: four A19 medium bulbs, 100-watt max (sold separately)
FEATURED IN THE SEAGULL SFERA COLLECTIVE: it’s easy to add stylish flair to your house with this modern 4 lights chandelier with a charming old world twist
This fixture is dimmable with a dimmable bulb (not included)

specifications.Warranty Description: All products purchased have a 30-day replacement parts policy to ensure a fully working item. All products are covered under a 1-year warranty when purchased on amazon. The warranty period begins on the day the product is originally shipped. The warranty covers all of the items and conditions identified in the original manufacturers warranty. Some of the items specifically not covered by the warranty are loss and theft, water damage, customer abuse, and finish detoriation due to uv or coastal exposure.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars18 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
